arwo iho smayil onbebi saha da obsawar chithrapata adhyakshanaya kala ohu 2001 wasare nirmanaya kala da hart of da miyar akadami sammana ulele esthoniyawa niyojanaya kala chithrapataya wiya. 88 sinamakarana patamalawe sisun ge adhyayana katayathu nima kirimen pasu ema sisun ekkota 88 sinama kawaya namin sinama kawayak da pihituwana lada athara emagin sama masakama palamu irida kolambaa sinama hamuwak da pawathiwina.me katayuththa sampurnayen ma mul wagakima daruwe ranjith sarya.mema sinama kawaya sambandhayen chithrapata sansthawe adhyaksha mandalaye anumathiya da labina.eyin tika kalakata pasu ohu chithrapata sansthawen samugena swadhina rupawahiniye niyojya samanyadhikari wada satahan dhurayata ek wiya.
